participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.background: My favourite artist is Travis Scott. I like playing basketball. I am currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. I have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.background: I enjoy long walks with my dog. I am married to a doctor. I am a professional tennis player. My family is continuously growing. I live in a three storey house.

content.text: I enjoy long walks with my dog, I am married to a doctor, I am a professional tennis player, my family is continuously growing and I live in a three storey house.
Hi! I'm looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. My favorite artist is Travis Scott, I like playing basketball and I have one older sister.
Cool! I'm a professional tennis player and my family is continuously growing. I also enjoy long walks with my dog.
What's your favourite song by Travis Scott?
My favourite song by Travis Scott is "Sicko Mode". It's such a catchy and upbeat song.
I agree! It's one of my favourites too.
What's your favourite thing to do in the summer?
I love to go swimming and play basketball.
Me too! I love being active in the summer.
What's your favourite thing about your life right now?
I love my family and my career. I'm very lucky to have both.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm happy for you.
Thank you! I'm glad to hear that you're happy too.
